StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateProgramAssignment]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ProgramAvailabilityID int, @ContractID int, @DutyPreference1 varchar(10) = NULL, @DutyPreference2 varchar(10) = NULL, @DutyPreference3 varchar(10) = NULL, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
DECLARE @DBID INT DECLARE @DBNAME NVARCHAR(128)
SET NOCOUNT ON
SET @DBID = DB_ID() SET @DBNAME = DB_NAME()
--- UPDATE PROGRAM AVAILABILITY RECORD WITH PROGRAM ASSIGNMENT UPDATE PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY SET CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID, PROGRAM_ASSIGNMENT_DATE = GETDATE(), USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID = @ProgramAvailabilityID
IF @@ERROR != 0 BEGIN RAISERROR ('An error occurred upda.ng the Program Availability record. Program not assigned.', 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
--- UPDATE DUTY PREFERENCE DATA IF NECESSARY IF (@DutyPreference1 IS NOT NULL OR @DutyPreference2 IS NOT NULL OR @DutyPreference3 IS NOT NULL) BEGIN UPDATE CONTRACT SET DUTY_PREFERENCE1 = @DutyPreference1, DUTY_PREFERENCE2 = @DutyPreference2, DUTY_PREFERENCE3 = @DutyPreference3, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID
IF @@ERROR != 0 BEGIN RAISERROR ('An error occurred upda.ng the Contract record. Program not assigned.', 16, 2, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END END
